import Foundation

let inp = readLine()!.components(separatedBy: [" "]).map { $0 }
let (s1, s2) = (inp[0], inp[1])

import Foundation

let inp = readLine()!.components(separatedBy: [" "]).map { $0 }
let (s1, s2) = (inp[0], inp[1])

print(s1 + s2)

print([s1, s2].joined())

// HelloWorld!
